name: Q-Boid
description:
Jump from platform to platform in this short and challenging puzzle game.
Immerse yourself in the 80s Synthwave inspired surroundings, complete with a fully original soundtrack.

Do you have an incredible high-score? Share it with us in the comments!

"Q-Boid" is designed for the Windows PC and can be controlled with a keyboard and controller.

This game was created as part of the htk Game Jam |  2022 Fire Edition with the theme "Arcade".

Controls:

Keyboard:

Space: Move Forward
A/D: Rotate Special Platforms
R: Reset
Escape: Pause

Controller:

A: Move
Left Stick/D-Pad/Shoulder-Buttons: Rotate
Y: Reset
Start Button: Pause

 Installation Guide:

  1.  Download the ZIP or RAR file, whichever you prefer, altough WinRAR is clearly superior in each and every aspect imaginable, but hey, to each their own.
  2.  Right click and select "Extract All...".
  3.  Save the files in a safe and dry place.
  4.  Start the .exe
  5.  Have fun playing!
